name: Sarah, you are way too heavy
name_original: Sarah, you are way too heavy
description:
We all have fancied what a romantic relationship could be like, yet what I’m doing is putting it in this work and let you experience it in person.
is a challenge game where the players are controlled to climb up nonstop: an interesting yet bitter process.
Now try to reach the peak of your life with your partner.
Caution is advised for those who are physically or mentally fragile.
